mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memberships(membershipid, membershipname, price, startdate, enddate, notes, discountamount, filename, filesize) VALUES(#{membershipid}, #{membershipname}, #{price}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{notes}, #{discountamount}, #{filename}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT membershipid, membershipname, price, startdate, enddate, notes, discountamount, filename, filesize FROM memberships ORDER BY membershipid
mapper.update: UPDATE memberships SET membershipname = #{membershipname}, price = #{price}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, notes = #{notes}, discountamount = #{discountamount}, filename = #{filename}, filesize = #{filesize} WHERE membershipid = #{membershipid}
